com.vungle.publisher

Interface EventListener


  • public interface EventListener

    The interface to implement in order to be notified of ad lifecycle events.

    Note that the callbacks are executed on a different thread than your main UI thread, so if you interact with your UI in the callback, you will need to use a technique to execute your callback on the main UI thread. Two common ways to run your code on the UI thread include the following:

    • Handler
    • Activity.runOnUiThread(Runnable)
    See Also:
    VunglePub.addEventListeners(EventListener...)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdEnd(boolean wasCallToActionClicked)
      Called when the user exits the ad (video and postroll, if any).
      void onAdPlayableChanged(boolean isAdPlayable)
      Called when ad playability changes.
      void onAdStart()
      Called when the user enters the video ad.
      void onAdUnavailable(java.lang.String reason)
      Called after VunglePub.playAd() and VunglePub.playAd(AdConfig) if an ad could not be played.
      void onVideoView(boolean isCompletedView, int watchedMillis, int videoMillis)
      Called when the user exits the ad with information about the user's longest video view (if the user watched the video multiple times).

    • Method Detail

      • onAdEnd

        void onAdEnd(boolean wasCallToActionClicked)
        Called when the user exits the ad (video and postroll, if any).
        Parameters:
        wasCallToActionClicked - true if the user clicked on the call to action (either in the video or post roll); otherwise, false.

      • onAdStart

        void onAdStart()
        Called when the user enters the video ad.

      • onAdUnavailable

        void onAdUnavailable(java.lang.String reason)
        Called after VunglePub.playAd() and VunglePub.playAd(AdConfig) if an ad could not be played.
        Parameters:
        reason - detail about why an ad was not available.

      • onAdPlayableChanged

        void onAdPlayableChanged(boolean isAdPlayable)
        Called when ad playability changes. Use this to determine if an ad can be played.
        Parameters:
        isAdPlayable - true when an ad can be played; false when an ad cannot be played.

      • onVideoView

        void onVideoView(boolean isCompletedView,
               int watchedMillis,
               int videoMillis)
        Called when the user exits the ad with information about the user's longest video view (if the user watched the video multiple times).
        Parameters:
        isCompletedView - true if the user watched enough of the video (80%) to count as a completed view; false if the user did not watch enough of the video to count as a completed view.
        watchedMillis - the longest the user watched the video (in milliseconds).
        videoMillis - the length of the video (in milliseconds).
